item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: <blockquote>heather</blockquote> I didn't say it wasn't funny, I'm just saying, if I asked the lads down at the pub if the got any FAT LEWT AND EPIXX last night... Well, they would kill me.
item.content:encoded:
heather

I didn’t say it wasn’t funny, I’m just saying, if I asked the lads down at the pub if the got any FAT LEWT AND EPIXX last night… Well, they would kill me.

item.description:
<strong>Blue Forge Fire recruitment video...</strong>
The Blue Forge Fire guild (of the Bloodhoof realm) has put forth the following recruitment video to help them obtain new members. I have a feeling they'll hear from one or two people: Found on the always-hilarious AFK Gamer. Thank you, Foton, for yet ...

item.title: By: Eradon

I have a little rule;
What happends on teh intrawebz, stays on teh intrawebz.
We adults should neeever talk that way IRL.
